validation_criteria.image_sharpness: Pixel-perfect for HUDs, natural for portraits, cinematic for environments
validation_criteria.color_vibrance: Green and red must be neon-bright in HUDs
validation_criteria.grain_visibility: Should be visible at 100% zoom in dark areas
validation_criteria.avatar_quality: Circular crop must be clean, no cutting at edges

images.name: HERO - Female Doctor Dramatic Lighting
images.prompt: Cinematic portrait of a distinguished female physician, age 38-42, dark hair pulled back in elegant bun, premium white medical coat, serious contemplative expression, side-lit with cool cyan-blue dramatic light from left side against deep dark background #1a1a1a. Looking slightly towards a subtle holographic glow (faint, not dominant). Shallow depth of field, sharp focus on face and coat, soft bokeh background. Moody editorial medical photography aesthetic, professional headshot style. Film grain texture ISO 600, high contrast, slightly desaturated tones. Cinematic lighting reminiscent of Chiaroscuro. Premium refined sophisticated mood. No smile, neutral to slightly concerned expression. Hands visible suggesting authority. Shot from shoulder up, centered composition. 4K ultra high quality.
images.prompt_alternative: Silhouette of a doctor from behind looking at a large luminous holographic medical dashboard in a dark room, cold blue and cyan light illuminating the scene, dramatic cinematic atmosphere, futuristic medical technology, shallow depth of field, film grain, 4K
images.placement_html: Absolute left side, width 50% desktop, hidden mobile, gradient fade-out right
images.placement_css: position: absolute; left: 0; top: 0; width: 50%; height: 100%; z-index: 1; background: linear-gradient(to right, rgba(0,0,0,1) 0%, transparent 100%);

images.name: THE FALL - Empty Waiting Room
images.prompt: Empty premium modern medical clinic waiting room, minimalist contemporary design with clean lines, completely devoid of people. Multiple uncomfortable empty modern chairs in muted gray/beige tones scattered in waiting area. Dark moody lighting, cool blue-tinted fluorescent ambiance #2a3a4a suggesting hospital cold fluorescence. Large wall clock showing exactly 14:45 (2:45 PM) in center of frame, clearly visible. Minimalist furniture: simple tables, abstract wall art barely visible in darkness. Wide-angle perspective with slight upward angle (subtle Dutch tilt creating tension). Deep shadows in corners suggesting desolation. No windows, stark clinical walls. Moody cinematic atmosphere, desolate abandoned feeling emphasizing waste and silence. High contrast lighting with dark shadows dominating. Film grain texture, desaturated tones with slight blue-green color cast. Sense of time passing, wasted resources, silence as absence. Medical clinic aesthetic but emphasizing emptiness. 4K ultra high quality.
images.placement_html: Background image, full width, opacity 40%, overlay dark gradient
images.placement_css: background-image: url(waiting-room.webp); background-size: cover; background-position: center; opacity: 0.4; position: absolute; inset: 0; z-index: 0;

images.name: THE FALL - Clock Motion Blur
images.prompt: Extreme macro close-up of premium analog wall clock, black face with Roman numerals in gold. Motion blur effect on clock hands suggesting rapid time passage (hands streaked with blur trails). Dark moody cinematic lighting (#0a0a0a background), shallow extreme depth of field, only clock face in sharp focus, background completely defocused dark void. Dramatic rim lighting on clock edges creating definition. Desaturated cool-blue tinted tones with gold accents on numerals. Film grain texture prominent ISO 800 feel. High contrast. Cinematic mood emphasizing time as enemy and passage. Abstract fine art photography style. Time as metaphor for wasted resources. Details: subtle dust particles visible in light, clock mounting hardware slightly visible suggesting fixed time. Motion blur direction: hands moving fast toward future creating urgency. 4K ultra high quality fine art photography.
images.placement_html: Float right in THE FALL section, margin-left auto, responsive full-width mobile
images.placement_css: float: right; width: 600px; height: 600px; margin-left: auto; border: 1px solid #333; border-radius: 8px; box-shadow: 0 8px 24px rgba(0,0,0,0.5);

images.name: MECHANISM - Radar HUD (Scanning)
images.prompt: Military-grade digital radar display screen on dark command center monitor, black background #0a0a0a. Circular radar sweep with glowing cyan scanning line moving across screen. Multiple bright cyan and green target dots scattered across grid (5247 targets detected visible as small glowing points). Geometric grid overlay with coordinate crosshairs, tactical interface elements in sharp focus. HUD text overlays reading "SCANNING: ACTIVE", "5247 TARGETS DETECTED", tactical data readouts in military font (like Courier New style). Sharp glowing edges on all UI elements, neon cyan and electric green accents. Dark command center aesthetic, high-contrast tactical operations center. Zero-depth background, pure black. Film grain subtle. Ultra sharp, pixel-perfect UI lines. Sci-fi military drone/radar operator view. 4K quality, perfect for web display.
images.placement_html: Inside card border, 100% card width, height auto, 20px internal margin
images.placement_css: width: 100%; height: auto; aspect-ratio: 1.4; object-fit: cover; border-radius: 4px; margin: 20px; border: 1px solid #00FF88;

images.name: MECHANISM - Target HUD (Targeting)
images.prompt: Digital sniper scope HUD interface locking onto a single glowing target on dark background #0a0a0a. Precision crosshair/reticle centered on screen, circular targeting framework around central bright cyan glowing point (the target). Floating data readouts in military tactical font hovering around crosshair: "MATCH PROBABILITY: 94%" (top), "PATIENT TICKET: R$ 800" (right), "LAST VISIT: 47 DAYS" (bottom). Additional tactical data: "ENGAGEMENT READY", "LOCK STATUS: CONFIRMED" in green text. Multiple concentric circles and geometric crosshairs, red lock-on indicator flashing at edges. HUD elements glowing cyan and red with slight glow effects. High contrast, razor-sharp lines. Film grain subtle. Heads-up display aesthetic from military fighter jet/sniper scope. Dark moody tactical mood. Zero-depth pure black background. Pixel-perfect UI precision. 4K quality.

generation_settings.special_instruction: PIXEL-PERFECT UI SHARPNESS REQUIRED - RED AND CYAN NEON BRIGHT

images.placement_html: Inside card border, 100% card width, height auto, 20px internal margin
images.placement_css: width: 100%; height: auto; aspect-ratio: 1.4; object-fit: cover; border-radius: 4px; margin: 20px; border: 1px solid #FF4444;

images.name: MECHANISM - Execute HUD (Executing)
images.prompt: High-speed digital missile/energy pulse launch visualization on tactical HUD screen, dark background #0a0a0a. Bright cyan-electric green energy pulse traveling from center origin point toward target on right side, leaving glowing light trail behind (motion blur suggesting extreme velocity). Concentric circles expanding outward from launch origin point showing impact force. Confirmation status overlay displaying "CONFIRMED: SLOT FILLED" in large military font, glowing green. Particle effects: small cyan/green digital particles dissipating and fading into background, suggesting data materialization/execution. Multiple HUD elements lighting up: "MISSION STATUS: EXECUTED", timing readout "0.3 seconds". High speed dynamic mood with directional motion blur trailing toward target. Sharp neon cyan and bright green glowing elements. Film grain, high contrast tactical command interface. Tactical operations command center aesthetic. Zero-depth black background. Pixel-perfect UI. 4K quality.

generation_settings.special_instruction: PIXEL-PERFECT UI SHARPNESS REQUIRED - EXTREME MOTION BLUR EFFECT

images.placement_html: Inside card border, 100% card width, height auto, 20px internal margin
images.placement_css: width: 100%; height: auto; aspect-ratio: 1.4; object-fit: cover; border-radius: 4px; margin: 20px; border: 1px solid #00FF88;
images.animation_css: Add pulsing glow: @keyframes pulse-glow { 0%, 100% { box-shadow: 0 0 10px #00FF88; } 50% { box-shadow: 0 0 30px #00FF88; } }

images.name: CLIMAX - Data Dissolving Background
images.prompt: Abstract digital data visualization showing financial numbers and data dissolving/disintegrating into particles. Panoramic composition. Dark background #0a0a0a with red and orange accent lighting fading into cool cyan-blue in opposite corners (hot to cold color transition symbolizing change). Large financial data numbers (like "R$ 2.4M", "R$ 8.2M") appearing as glowing particles floating and falling through dark space, slowly fading and disintegrating. Scattered graph lines breaking apart and dissolving into light trails. No literal money or flames, but metaphorical "evaporation" of financial value through particle effects. Cinematic data visualization aesthetic. Film grain, high contrast. Motion suggestion: particles moving downward and outward. Color grading: warm orange-red in upper left fading to cool blue-cyan in lower right. Abstract financial loss visualization. 4K cinematic quality.
images.placement_html: Absolute position behind calculator content, full width section, opacity 30-40%, z-index 0
images.placement_css: position: absolute; inset: 0; z-index: 0; opacity: 0.35; background-image: url(data-dissolving.webp); background-size: cover; background-position: center;

validation.color_gradient: warm red/orange left to cool cyan right

images.name: TESTIMONIALS - Avatar Dr. Roberto M.
images.prompt: Professional headshot of a distinguished Brazilian male cardiovascular surgeon, age 55-62, with silver-gray hair and well-trimmed salt-and-pepper beard, wearing premium crisp white lab coat over dark shirt. Confident warm professional expression, slight confidence in eyes. Dramatic side lighting from left (Rembrandt-style three-point lighting), creating depth and character on face. Solid deep dark background #1a1a1a for clean circular crop. Centered headshot composition optimized for circular avatar (face centered, no cutting at forehead or chin). Shallow depth of field, sharp focus on face and eyes. Refined editorial portrait photography. Subtle film grain texture. High contrast warm professional mood. Sophisticated serious demeanor. Latin American facial features. Looking slightly off-camera (classical portrait angle). Gloss/sheen on white coat suggesting quality. 4K ultra high definition.
images.placement_html: Circular avatar left of name/title, 100-120px display size
images.placement_css: width: 100px; height: 100px; border-radius: 50%; border: 2px solid #00FF88; object-fit: cover; flex-shrink: 0; box-shadow: 0 8px 24px rgba(0,0,0,0.5);

validation.face_centering: face centered, no cutting at forehead/chin

images.name: TESTIMONIALS - Avatar Dra. Juliana S.
images.prompt: Professional headshot of a sophisticated Brazilian female dermatologist and clinic owner, age 42-48, with dark lustrous hair elegantly pulled back in polished bun or sleek ponytail, wearing refined premium white lab coat over elegant dark blouse (suggesting professional polish). Warm confident expression with intelligence in eyes, slight professional smile. Dramatic side lighting from left (Rembrandt three-point setup), creating depth and dimension on face. Solid deep dark background #1a1a1a for clean circular crop. Centered headshot composition optimized for circular avatar (face perfectly centered). Shallow depth of field with sharp focus on face. Refined editorial medical portrait aesthetic. Subtle film grain. High contrast refined professional mood. Elegant sophisticated demeanor. Latin American facial features, refined beauty. Looking slightly off-camera (classical portrait angle). Impeccable grooming, luxury aesthetic. Clinic owner presence. 4K ultra high definition.
images.placement_html: Circular avatar left of name/title, 100-120px display size
images.placement_css: width: 100px; height: 100px; border-radius: 50%; border: 2px solid #00FF88; object-fit: cover; flex-shrink: 0; box-shadow: 0 8px 24px rgba(0,0,0,0.5);

validation.face_centering: face centered, no cutting at forehead/chin

images.name: CTA FINAL - Corridor with Light
images.prompt: Long modern luxury medical clinic corridor extending into distance, dark foreground transitioning to warm golden-amber light at far end. Polished dark floors reflecting subtle light, minimalist sleek walls in dark tones (#1a1a2a). Strong central perspective with vanishing point dead-center leading toward illuminated exit/future. Architectural lines creating sense of forward movement. Open doors at end glowing with warm golden light (#ffb84d) suggesting hope and decision point. Dramatic contrast between dark foreground (shadows dominating) and warm illuminated background. Clinical sophisticated aesthetic but cinematically dramatic. No people visible. Soft subtle lighting in mid-section transitioning to bright warm glow ahead. Cinematic photography style inspired by psychological thrillers showing crossroads moment. Film grain texture, high contrast. Mood of decision, turning point, forward momentum toward light. Premium luxury clinic aesthetic with dramatic decision-moment symbolism. 4K ultra high quality.
images.placement_html: Background image, full width, opacity 30%, overlay dark gradient, CTA buttons on top
images.placement_css: background-image: url(corridor-light.webp); background-size: cover; background-position: center; opacity: 0.30; position: absolute; inset: 0; z-index: 0;
images.content_zindex: z-index: 10 for CTA buttons and text

validation.light_contrast: dark foreground to bright golden light
validation.door_glow: warm golden light at end visible

phase_1.name: CRITICAL PRIORITY BATCH
phase_1.instructions: Generate all 6 images in parallel if possible, validate each for sharpness/color accuracy, apply post-processing, export WebP
phase_1.validation_before_phase2: All 6 images must pass validation checks before proceeding to Phase 2

phase_2.name: ELEVATION BATCH
phase_2.instructions: Generate both images, apply post-processing, export WebP with reduced opacity readiness
phase_2.validation_before_phase3: Both background images must have correct mood/atmosphere

phase_3.name: POLISH BATCH
phase_3.instructions: Generate final 2 images, apply post-processing, export WebP
phase_3.validation_final: All 10 images ready for web deployment

pre_generation: ☐ Generation tool set to MAXIMUM quality
during_generation: ☐ Check file sizes don't exceed limits
post_processing: ☐ Verify grain is visible at 100% zoom
validation: ☐ No blurry text or UI elements

final_qa.size_validation: All images tested in actual HTML/CSS layout
